analyzed: rakkhaṇa atthānam dhātūnam payoge yam icchitam tam kārakam apādāna saññam hoti

original: Kāke rakkhanti taṇḍulā, yavā paṭisedhenti gāvo.
analyzed: kāke rakkhanti taṇḍulāḥ yavāḥ paṭisedhenti gāvaḥ
yena vā dassanam

original: Yena vā adassanamicchitaṃ, taṃ kārakaṃ apādānasaññaṃ hoti.
analyzed: yena vā a dassanam icchitam tam kārakam apādāna saññam hoti

original: Upajjhāyā antaradhāyati sisso, mātarā ca pitarā ca antaradhāyati putto.
analyzed: upajjhāyā antaradhāyati sissaḥ mātarā ca pitarā ca antaradhāyati putto

original: Vāti kimatthaṃ? Sattamīvibhatyattaṃ. Jetavane antaradhāyati bhagavā.
analyzed: vāti kimattham jetavane antaradhāyati bhagavā

original: 275, 312. Dūranti kaddha kāla nimmāna tvālopa disāyogavibhattārappayoga suddhappamocana hetu vivittappamāṇa pubbayogabandhana guṇavacana pañha kathana thokākattūsu ca.
Dūratthe, antikatthe, addhanimmāne, kālanimmāne, tvālope, disāyoge, vibhatte, ārappayoge,
analyzed: dūra atthe antika atthe addha nimmāne kāla nimmāne tu ā lope disā yoge vibhatte āra ppa yoge

original: suddhe, pamocane, hetvatthe, vivittatthe, pamāṇe, pubbayoge, bandhanatthe, guṇavacane,
analyzed: suddhe pamocane hetu atthe vivitta atthe pamāṇe pubba yoge bandhana tthe guṇavacane

original: pañhe, kathane, thoke, akattari ca iccetesvatthesu, payogesu ca, taṃ kārakaṃ apādānasaññaṃ hoti.
analyzed: pañhe kathane thoke a kattari ca payogesu ca tam kārakam apādāna saññam hoti

original: Dūratthetāva – kīva dūro ito naḷakāragāmo, dūrato vā gamma, ārakā te moghapurisā
analyzed: kīva dūraḥ itas naḷakāra gāmaḥ dūratas vā te mogha purisā

original: imasmā dhammavinayā. Dutiyā ca tatiyā ca, dūraṃ gāmaṃ āvato, dūrena gāmena vā āgato.
analyzed: imasmai dhamma vinayā dutiyā ca tatiyā ca dūram gāmaṃ āvataḥ dūrena gāmena vā āgato

original: Ārakā imaṃ dhammavinayaṃ, anena dhammavinayena vā iccevamādi.
analyzed: ārakāḥ imam dhamma vinayam anena dhamma vinayena vā icca evamādi

original: Antikatthe – antikaṃ gāmā, āsannaṃ gāmā, samīpaṃ gāmā, samīpaṃ saddhammā. Dutiyā
analyzed: antika atthe antikam gāmā āsannam gāmā samīpam gāmā samīpam saddhammā dutiyā

original: ca tatiyā ca, antikaṃ gāmaṃ, antikaṃ gāmena vā. Āsannaṃ gāmaṃ, āsannaṃ gāmena vā.
analyzed: ca tatiyā ca antikam gāmam antikam gāmena vā āsannam gāmam āsannam gāmena vā

original: Samīpaṃ gāmaṃ. Samīpaṃ gāmena vā. Samīpaṃ saddhammaṃ, samīpaṃ saddhammena vā iccevamādi.
analyzed: samīpam gāmam samīpam gāmena vā samīpam saddhammam samīpam saddhammena vā icca evamādi

original: Addhanimmāne – ito mathurāya catūsu yojanesu saṅkassaṃ nāma nagaraṃ atthi, tattha bahū janā vasanti iccevamādi.
analyzed: addhanimmāne itas mathurāya catūsu yojanesu saṅkassam nāma nagaram atthi tattha bahū janāḥ vasanti icca evamādi

original: Kālanimmāne – ito bhikkhave ekanavutikappe vipassī nāma bhagavā loke udapādi, ito tiṇṇaṃ māsānaṃ accayena parinibbāyissati iccevamādi.
analyzed: kāla nimmāne itas bhikkhave ekanavuti kappe vipassī nāma bhagavā loke udapādi itas tiṇṇam māsānam accayena parinibbāyissati icca evamādi

original: Tvālope kammādhikaraṇesu – pāsādā saṅkameyya, pāsādaṃ abhiruhitvā vā. Pabbatā saṅkameyya,
analyzed: tu ālope kamma adhikaraṇesu pāsādā saṅkameyya pāsādam abhiruhitvā vā pabbatā saṅkameyya

original: pabbataṃ abhiruhitvā vā. Hatthikkhandhā saṅkameyya, hatthikkhandhaṃ abhiruhitvā vā.
analyzed: pabbatam abhiruhitvā vā hatthi khandhā saṅkameyya hatthi khandham abhiruhitvā vā

original: Āsanā vuṭṭhaheyya. Āsane nisīditvā vā iccevamādi.
analyzed: āsanā vuṭṭhaheyya āsane nisīditvā vā iti evamādi

original: Disāyoge – avicito yāva uparibhavaggamantare bahū sattanikāyā vasanti, yato khemaṃ
analyzed: disā yoge avicitaḥ yāva upari bha vaggam antare bahū satta nikāyāḥ vasanti yatas

original: tato bhayaṃ, puratthimato, dakkhiṇato, pacchimato, uttarato aggī pajjalanti, yato
analyzed: tatas bhayam puratthimatas dakkhiṇatas pacchimatas uttaratas aggī pajjalanti yatas

original: assosuṃ bhagavantaṃ, uddhaṃ pādatalā adho kesamatthakā iccevamādi.
analyzed: assosum bhagavantam uddham pāda talāḥ adho kesamatthakāḥ icc evamādi

original: Vibhatte – yato paṇītataro vā visiṭṭhataro vā natthi. Chaṭṭhī ca, channavutīnaṃ pāsaṇḍānaṃ, dhammānaṃ pavaraṃ yadidaṃ sugatavinayo iccevamādi.
analyzed: vibhatte yatas paṇītataraḥ vā visiṭṭhataraḥ vā natthi chaṭṭhī ca channavutīnam pāsaṇḍānam dhammānam pavaram yat idam sugata vinayaḥ icca evamādi

original: Ārappayoge – gāmadhammā vasaladhammā asaddhammā ārati virati paṭivirati, pāṇātipātā veramaṇī iccevamādi.
analyzed: āra ppayoge gāma dhammāḥ vasala dhammāḥ asat dhammāḥ ārati virati paṭivirati pāṇa atipātā veramaṇī icca evamādi

original: Suddhe – lobhaniyehi dhammehi suddho asaṃsaṭṭho, mātito ca pitito ca suddho asaṃsaṭṭho anupakuddho agarahito iccevamādi.
analyzed: suddhe lobhaniyehi dhammehi suddhaḥ asaṃsaṭṭhaḥ mātitaḥ ca pititaḥ ca suddhaḥ asaṃsaṭṭhaḥ anupakuddhaḥ a garahitaḥ icca evamādi

original: Pamocane – parimutto dukkhasmāti vadāmi, muttosmi mārabandhanā, na te muccanti maccunā iccevamādi.
analyzed: pamocane parimuttaḥ dukkhasma ati vadāmi muttaḥ asmi māra bandhanā na te muccanti maccunā icca evamādi

original: Hetvatthe – kasmā hetunā, kena hetunā, kissa hetunā, kasmā nu tumhaṃ daharā na mīyare, kasmā idheva maraṇaṃ bhavissati iccevamādi.
analyzed: hetu atthe kasmai hetunā kena hetunā kissa hetunā kasmai nu tumham daharāḥ na mīyare kasmai idha iva maraṇam bhavissati icc evamādi

original: Vivittatthe – vivitto pāpakā dhammā, vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi iccevamādi.
analyzed: vivitta atthe vivittaḥ pāpakāḥ dhammāḥ vivicca iva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi icca evamādi

original: Pamāṇe – dīghaso navavidatthiyo sugatavidatthiyā pamāṇikā kāretabbā, majjhimassa purisassa aḍḍha teḷasahatthā iccevamādi.
analyzed: pamāṇe sugata vidatthiyā pamāṇikā kāretabbā majjhimassa purisassa icca evamādi
pubba yoge pubbā iva sammodhā icca evamādi

original: Bandhanatthe – satasmā bandho naro. Tatiyā ca, satena bandho naro raññā iṇatthena iccevamādi.
analyzed: bandhana atthe satasmā bandho naro tatiyā ca satena bandho naro raññā iṇ atthena iti ca evamādi

original: Guṇavacane – puññāya sugatiṃ yanti, cāgāya vipulaṃ dhanaṃ, paññāya vimuttimano, issariyāya janaṃ rakkhati rājā iccevamādi.
analyzed: guṇavacane puññāya sugatim yanti cāgāya vipulam dhanam paññāya vimutti manaḥ issariyāya janam rakkhati rājā icca evamādi

original: Pañhe tvālope kammādhikaraṇesu – abhidhammā pucchanti, abhidhammaṃ sutvā, abhidhamme
analyzed: pañhe tu ālope kamma adhikaraṇesu abhidhammā pucchanti abhidhammam sutvā abhidhamme

original: ṭhatvā vā. Vinayā pucchanti, vinayaṃ sutvā, vinaye ṭhatvā vā. Dutiyā ca tatiyā ca,
analyzed: ṭhatvā vā vinayā pucchanti vinayam sutvā vinaye ṭhatvā vā dutiyā ca tatiyā ca

original: abhidhammaṃ, abhidhammena vā. Vinayaṃ, vinayena vā. Eva suttā, geyyā, gāthāya, veyyākaraṇā,
analyzed: abhidhammam abhidhammena vā vinayam vinayena vā eva suttāḥ geyyāḥ gāthāya veyyākaraṇā

original: udānā, itivuttakā, jātakā, abbhutadhammā, vedallā iccevamādi.
analyzed: udānāḥ itivuttakāḥ jātakāḥ abbhutadhammāḥ vedallāḥ icca evamādi

original: Kathane tvālope kammādhikaraṇesu – abhidhammā kathayanti, abhidhammaṃ sutvā, abhidhamme
analyzed: kathane tu ālope kamma adhikaraṇesu abhidhammā kathayanti abhidhammam sutvā abhidhamme

original: ṭhatvā vā. Vinayā kathayanti, vinayaṃ sutvā, vinaye ṭhatvā vā. Dutiyā ca tatiyā ca,
analyzed: vā kathayanti vinayam sutvā vinaye ṭhatvā vā dutiyā ca tatiyā ca

original: abhidhammaṃ, abhidhammena vā. Vinayaṃ vinayena vā. Evaṃ suttā, geyyā, gāthāya, veyyākaraṇā,
analyzed: abhidhammam abhidhammena vā vinayam vinayena vā evam suttāḥ geyyāḥ gāthāya veyyākaraṇā

original: udānā, itivuttakā, jātakā, abbhutadhammā, vedallā iccevamādi.
analyzed: udānāḥ itivuttakāḥ jātakāḥ abbhutadhammāḥ vedallāḥ icca evamādi

original: Thoke – thokā muccanti. Appamattakā muccanti, kicchā muccanti. Tatiyā ca. Thokena, appamattakena, kicchena vā iccevamādi.
analyzed: thoke  thokāḥ muccanti appamattakāḥ muccanti kicchāḥ muccanti tatiyā ca thokena appamattakena kicchena vā icca evamādi

original: Akattarica – kammassa katattā upacitattā ussannattā vipulattā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hoti iccevamādi.
analyzed: kammassa kata ttā upacita ttā ussanna ttā vipula ttā cakkhu viññāṇam uppannam hoti icc evamādi

original: Caggahaṇena sesesupi ye mayā nopadiṭṭhā apādānapayogikā, te payogavicakkhaṇehi yathāyogaṃ yojetabbā.
analyzed: ca ggahaṇena sesesu pi ye mayā na upadiṭṭhāḥ apādāna payogikā te payoga vicakkhaṇehi yathāyogam yojetabbā

original: 276, 302. Yassa dātukāmo rocate dhārayate vā taṃ sampadānaṃ.
analyzed: yassa dātu kāmaḥ rocate dhārayate vā tam sampadānam

original: Yassa vā dātukāmo yassa vārocate, yassa vā dhārayate, taṃ kārakaṃ sampadānasaññaṃ hoti.
analyzed: yassa vā dātu kāmaḥ yassa vā ārocate yassa vā dhārayate tam kārakam sampadāna saññam hoti

original: Samaṇassa cīvaraṃ dadāti, samaṇassa rocate saccaṃ, devadattassa suvaṇṇacchattaṃ dhārayate yaññadatto.
analyzed: samaṇassa cīvaram dadāti samaṇassa rocate saccam devadattassa suvaṇṇa chattam dhārayate yaññadattaḥ
sampadānam iccanena kvatthaḥ sampadāne catutthī

original: Vāti vikappanatthaṃ, dhātunāmānaṃ payoge vā upasaggappayoge vā nipātappayoge vā sati atthavikappanatthaṃ vāti padaṃ payujjati.
analyzed: vā ati vikappana attham dhātu nāmānam payoge vā upasagga ppayoge vā nipāta ppayoge vā sati attha vikappana attham vā ati padam payujjati

original: 277, 303. Silāgha hanu ṭhā sapa dhāra piha kudha duhissosūya rādhikkha paccāsuṇa
analyzed: silāgha hanu ṭhā sapa dhāra piha kudha duhissa usūya rādhikkha paccāsuṇa

original: anupatigiṇa pubbakattārocanattha tadattha tumatthālamattha maññānādarappāṇini, gatyatthakammani,
analyzed: anu pa ti giṇa pubba kattā rocanattha tadattha tumattha alamattha maññāna ādara ppāṇini gati attha kammani
āsīsattha sammuti bhiyya sattamī atthesu ca

original: Silāgha hanu ṭhā sapa dhāra piha kudha duha issaiccetesaṃ dhātūnaṃ payoge, usūyatthānañca
analyzed: silāgha hanu ṭhā sapa dhāra piha kudha duha dhātūnam payoge usūyatthānam ca

original: payoge, rādhikkhappayoge, paccāsuṇaanupatigiṇānaṃ pubbakattari, ārocanatthe, tadatthe,
analyzed: payoge rādhikkha ppayoge pacca āsuṇa anu pati giṇānam pubba kattari ārocana atthe tad atthe

original: tumatthe, alamatthe, maññatippayoge anādare appāṇini, gatyatthānaṃ dhātūnaṃ kammani,
analyzed: tum atthe alam atthe mañña ti payoge an ādare ap pāṇini gati atthānam dhātūnam kammani

original: āsīsatthe ca sammuti bhiyya sattamyatthesu ca, taṃ kārakaṃ sampadānasaññaṃ hoti.
analyzed: āsīsatthe ca sammuti bhiyya sattamī atthesu ca tam kārakam sampadāna saññam hoti

original: Silāghappayoge tāva – buddhassa silāghate, dhammassa silāghate, saṅghassa silāghate, sakaṃupajjhāyassa silāghate, tava silāghate mama silāghate iccevamādi.
analyzed: silāgha ppayoge tāva buddhassa silāghate dhammassa silāghate saṅghassa silāghate sakaṃupajjhāyassa silāghate tava silāghate mama silāghate icca evamādi

original: Hanuppayoge – hanute tuyhameva, hanute mayhameva iccevamādi.
analyzed: hanuppayoge hanute tuyham eva hanute mayham eva iti evamādi

original: Ṭhāpayoge – upatiṭṭheyya sakyaputtānaṃ vaḍḍhakī, bhikkhussa bhuñjantassa pānīyena vā vidhūpanena vā upatiṭṭheyya bhikkhunī iccevamādi.
analyzed: upatiṭṭheyya sakyaputtānam vaḍḍhakī bhikkhussa bhuñjantassa pānīyena vā vidhūpanena vā upatiṭṭheyya bhikkhunī icc evamādi

original: Sapappayoge – tuyhaṃ sapate, mayhaṃ sapate iccevamādi.
analyzed: sapa ppayoge tuyham sapate mayham sapate iti ca evamādi
dhāra ppayoge suvaṇṇam te dhārayate icca evamādi

original: Pihappayoge – buddhassa aññatitthiyā pihayanti, devā dassanakāmā te, yato icchāmi bhaddantassa, samiddhānaṃ pihayanti daliddā iccevamādi.
analyzed: buddhassa añña titthiyā pihayanti devāḥ dassana kāmā te yatas icchāmi bhaddantassa samiddhānam pihayanti daliddāḥ icca evamādi

original: Kudhaduhaissausūyappayoge – kodhayati deva dattassa, tassa kujjha mahāvīra, mā raṭṭhaṃ
analyzed: kodhayati deva dattassa tassa kujjha mahāvīra mā raṭṭham

original: vinassa idaṃ. Duhayati disānaṃ megho, titthiyā samaṇānaṃ issayanti guṇagiddhena,
analyzed: vinasse idam duhayati disānam meghaḥ titthiyā samaṇānam issayanti guṇa giddhena

original: titthiyā samaṇānaṃ issayanti lābhagiddhena, dujjanā guṇavantānaṃ usūyanti guṇagiddhena,
analyzed: titthiyā samaṇānam issayanti lābha giddhena dujjanāḥ guṇavantānam usūyanti guṇa giddhena
kā usūyā vijānatam id ca evamādi

original: Rādha ikkha iccetesaṃ dhātūnaṃ payoge yassa akathitassa pucchanaṃ kammavikkhyāpanatthañca, taṃ kārakaṃ sampadānasaññaṃ hoti, dutiyā ca.
analyzed: rādhaḥ ikkhaḥ iti ca etesam dhātūnam payoge yassa a kathitassa pucchanam kamma vikkhyāpana attham ca tam kārakam sampadāna saññam hoti dutiyā ca

original: Ārādhohaṃ rañño, ārādhohaṃ rājānaṃ, kyāhaṃ ayyānaṃ aparajjhāmi, kyāhaṃ ayye aparajjhāmi,
analyzed: ārādhaḥ uham raññaḥ ārādhaḥ uham rājānam kyā aham ayyānam aparajjhāmi kyā aham ayye aparajjhāmi

original: cakkhuṃ janassa dassanāya taṃ viya maññe, āyasmato upālittherassa upasampadāpekkho
analyzed: cakkhum janassa dassanāya tam viya maññe āyasmataḥ upāli ttherassa upasampada apekkho
upatisso āyasmantam vai iti evamādi

original: Paccāsuṇa anupatigiṇānaṃ pubbakattari suṇotissa paccāyoge yassa kammuno pubbassa yo kattā, so sampadānasañño hoti.
analyzed: pacca a suṇa anu pa ti giṇānam pubba kattari suṇotissa pacca āyoge yassa kammunaḥ pubbassa yaḥ kattā saḥ sampadāna saññaḥ hoti
tam yathā bhagavā bhikkhū etat avoca

original: Bhikkhūti akathīta kammaṃ, etanti kathitakammaṃ. Yassa kammuno pubbassa yo kattā,
analyzed: bhikkhu iti a kathīta kammam etat ti kathita kammam yassa kammunaḥ pubbassa yaḥ kattā

original: so‘bhagavā’ti “yo karoti sa kattā”ti suttavacanena kattusañño. Evaṃ yassa kammuno
analyzed: so bhagavā iti yaḥ karoti sa kattā ati sutta vacanena kattu saññaḥ evam yassa kammuno

original: pubbassa yo kattā, so sampadānasañño hoti.
analyzed: pubbassa yaḥ kattā so sampadāna saññaḥ hoti

original: Taṃ yathā? Te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṃ, āsuṇanti buddhassa bhikkhū.
analyzed: tam yathā te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ paccassosuṃ āsuṇanti buddhassa bhikkhū

original: Giṇassa anupatiyoge yassa kammuno pubbassa yo kattā, so sampadānasañño hoti.
analyzed: giṇassa anupatiyoge yassa kammuno pubbassa yaḥ kattā saḥ sampadāna saññaḥ hoti

original: Taṃ yathā? Bhikkhu janaṃ dhammaṃ sāveti, tassa bhikkhuno jano anugiṇāti, tassa bhikkhuno jano patigiṇāti.
analyzed: tam yathā bhikkhu janam dhammam sāveti tassa bhikkhunaḥ janaḥ anugiṇāti tassa bhikkhunaḥ janaḥ patigiṇāti
yaḥ vadeti sakattā ati
vuttam kamman ti vuccati
yaḥ paṭiggāhakaḥ tassa
sampadānam vijāniyā
it ca evamādi

original: Ārocanatthe – ārocayāmi vo bhikkhave, āmantayāmi vo bhikkhave, paṭivedayāmi vo bhikkhave, ārocayāmi te mahārāja, āmantayāmi te mahārāja, paṭivedayāmi te mahārāja iccevamādi.
analyzed: ārocana atthe ārocayāmi vaḥ bhikkhave āmantayāmi vaḥ bhikkhave paṭivedayāmi vaḥ bhikkhave ārocayāmi te mahā rāja āmantayāmi te mahā rāja paṭivedayāmi te mahā rāja icca evamādi

original: Tadatthe – ūnassa pāripūriyā taṃ cīvaraṃ nikkhipitabbaṃ. Buddhassa atthāya, dhammassa atthāya, saṅghassa atthāya, jīvitaṃ pariccajāmi iccevamādi.
analyzed: tad atthe ūnassa pāripūriyā tam cīvaram nikkhipitabbam buddhassa atthāya dhammassa atthāya saṅghassa atthāya jīvitam pariccajāmi icca evamādi

original: Tumatthe -lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ buddho loke uppajjati. Bhikkhūnaṃ phāsuvihārāya vinayo paññatto iccevamādi.
analyzed: tumun atthe loka anukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya deva manussānam buddhaḥ loke uppajjati bhikkhūnam phāsu vihārāya vinayo paññatto icc evamādi

original: Alamatthappayoge-alamiti arahati paṭikkhittesu. Alaṃ me buddho, alaṃ me rajjaṃ, alaṃ
analyzed: alam attha payoge alam iti arahati paṭikkhittesu alam me buddhaḥ alam me rajjam alam

original: bhikkhu pattassa, alaṃ mallo mallassa, arahati mallo mallassa. Paṭikkhitte alaṃ te
analyzed: bhikkhu pattassa alam mallaḥ mallassa arahati mallaḥ mallassa paṭikkhitte alam te

original: rūpaṃ karaṇīyaṃ, alaṃ me hiraññasuvaṇṇena iccevamādi.
analyzed: rūpam karaṇīyam alam me hirañña suvaṇṇena icc evamādi

original: Maññatippayoge anādare appāṇini-kaṭṭhassa tuvaṃ maññe, kaliṅgarassa tuvaṃ maññe.
analyzed: mañña tippayoge anādare tuvam maññe kaliṅgarassa tuvam maññe

original: Anādareti kimatthaṃ? Suvaṇṇaṃ viya taṃ maññe.
analyzed: anādara iti kimattham suvaṇṇam viya tam maññe

original: Vinayamadhīte venayiko, vinayamadhīte vā. Evaṃ suttantiko, ābhidhammiko, veyyākaraṇiko.

original: Kāyena kataṃ kammaṃ kāyikaṃ, kāyena kataṃ kammaṃ vā. Evaṃ vācasikaṃ, mānasikaṃ.

original: Sarīre sannidhānā vedanā sārīrikā, sarīre sannidhānā vā, evaṃ mānasikā.

original: Dvāre niyutto dovāriko, dvāre niyutto vā. Evaṃ bhaṇḍāgāriko, nāgariko, nāvakammiko.

original: Suttena bandho suttiko, suttena bandho vā.
analyzed: suttena bandhaḥ suttikaḥ suttena bandhaḥ vā

original: Kumbho assa parimāṇaṃ kumbhikaṃ, kumbho assa parimāṇaṃ vā.

original: Sambamhi maṇḍale alanti sambalaṃ, agge gatikoṭille alanti aggaḷaṃ. Iccevamādayo aññepi saddā bhavanti.

original: Puthaiccetassa pāṭipadikassa puthu pathādesā honti, kvaci amapaccayo hoti.

original: Putha hutvā jātanti puthavī pathame jāto pathamo, pathavī, paṭhamo vā, puthu kilese janetīti puthujjano, puthu hutvā jātanti pathavī, pathavī vā.

tu

original: Sasu dada ada madaiccevamādīhi dhātūhi tu duiccete paccayā honti.

original: Aññe satte sasati hiṃsatīti sattu, dukkhaṃ dadātīti daddu, dukkhena adati bhakkhati

original: etthāti addu, dukkhaṃ adati anubhavati jano etenāti vā addu, dukkhaṃ bhājanaṃ ādhāraṃ

original: bhāvatīti vā addu, madati ummattaṃ karotīti maddu, madati maddabhāvaṃ karotīti vā maddu.

īvaro
ci pā dhā i t ca evamādīhi dhātūhi

original: Cīyatīti cīvaraṃ, pivatīti pīvaro, pātabbaṃ rakkhitabbanti vā pīvaraṃ. Dhāreti dhāretvā jīvitaṃ kappetīti dhīvaro, dhīvaraṃ.

munā ādīhi ci

original: Muna yata agga pata kava suca ruca mahāla bhaddāla manaiiccevamādīhi dhātūhi, pāṭipadikehi ca ipaccayo hoti.

original: Atthānatthaṃ munāti, ñeyyadhammaṃ lakkhaṇādivasena vā jānātīti muni, yatati vīriyaṃ
analyzed: attha anattham munāti ñeyya dhammam lakkhaṇa ādi vasena vā jānāti iti muni yatati vīriyam

analyzed: karoti iti kuṭila bhāvam gacchati iti patati seṭṭhaḥ hutvā puratas gacchati iti

vid ādi hi ūro

original: Vida valla masa sida dukukapu maya udi khajja kuraiccevamādīhi dhātūhi, pāṭipadikehi ca ūrapaccayohoti.

original: Vidituṃ alanti vidūro, vidūraṭṭhāne jāto vedūro, vallati vallabhāvena bhavatīti vallūro,

nu

original: Hana jana bhāri khanu ama ve vedhā siki hi iccevamādīhi dhātūhi nu ṇu kuiccete paccayā honti.

analyzed: bhojanam hanati hiṃsati etena ati haṇu hanu vā gamanam janeti iti bhāṇu dibbati iti

original: Manu pūra suṇa kusu ila ala maha si ki iccevamādīhi dhātūhi, pāṭipadikehi ca usa nusa isaiccete paccayā honti, puna nippajjante.
